content:
I'm wondering if there is anyone who is familiar with Swift and could help me revive the Swift UI example?

Basically we have the Swift UI example in the roc repository. But I haven't been able to get it working at all.

I have made a starter platform for Swift at https://github.com/lukewilliamboswell/roc-platform-template-swift

I think it would be nice to have a Swift UI example, and would love to upgrade the example platform.

I imagine for someone familiar with Swift this would be easy to do, just wiring up a hello world is all I think we need for now. I haven't learnt enough Swift yet to understand what I'm doing wrong, though managed to get the package working for swift build.
